About.Hours & facilities: General reference assistance available. Copying services for photographs, maps and plans available.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit and details of query required by letter or by telephone.

About.Acquisition focus: Collection includes newspaper cuttings, letters, programs, some written articles, some written memoirs and some biographical material of early Ringwood residents, reports and minutes of Ringwood organisations, some diaries (limited access).

Contact.Enquiries to: Richard Carter 9870 6211 (A/H 9876 4124) 128 Maroondah Highway, Ringwood 3134 Sandra Smart (Secretary) 9870 4351
